"<br>About \"My Room\"<br>": "Each player has a dedicated private room, known as My Room."

"By accessing the terminal, you can place Room Goods, change wallpaper and make other changes as you like.

Room Goods can be bought from shops or be dropped by enemies."

"You have one My Room on each ship. If you create multiple characters, they will share the same My Room.

Decorate your My Room however you choose and invite your friends to visit. Have fun with My Room!"
